main.name: Kritika Verma
main.description: Good logical and interpersonal skills. I have a background in computer science and 2+ years of experience in the IT industry. Working experience in different technical languages, frameworks, and tools. Strong Concepts in core subjects.
main.bio: Dynamic and detail-oriented Software Engineer with over 2 years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining robust software applications. Proficient in various programming languages and frameworks, with a strong background in full-stack development, software lifecycle management. Having fundamental knowledge in Data Structure, Algorithms, OOPS, DBMS, and Operating Systems.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
